name: Spacegray Theme
description: Spacegray theme for IntelliJ, inspired by one made by Gadzhi Kharkharov for SublimeText
notes:
1.4.1
  • Fixed code completion background colour
  • Fixed readability for bottom warning notifications
1.4.0
  • Adapting to IDEA 2019.2
  • Fix for disabled parameter info foreground
1.3.1
  • Material Theme compatibility bugfix
1.3
  • Added support for Material Theme UI plugin
1.2
  • Restyled buttons
1.1
  • Inversed colours on info tooltips for readability
  • Added screenshot
1.0
  • Initial release
